title: Panel, 1962-27-12
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: warp-faced plain weave with discontinuous supplementary wefts; interlacing on plain weave on group warps; branching of grouped warps; sides intact; ends of each have warp selvage
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing
description: Heavy cotton with border at ends. Highly stylized design, zigzags and geometric motifs in red, yellow, blue, green, and grey-violet. Piece consists of two sections, hand stitched at center. Cords at corners.
